channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge wild tree growing outside of our garden and branches overhand our boundaries.branches falling on our land being dangerous, 27th July
item.description:
This is an old wild tree with huge branches which are growing onto our garden. Sometimes branches are falling and couple of times nearly hit my child. Some sort of produce of the tree is also falling (which are heavy) and causing us a distress and fear to use the garden. We donâ€™t know whose tree that is but it overhangs into our land causing a lot of discomfort and stress.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wimborne Way, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous overspilling bins, 27th July
item.description:
These bins have been overspilling for years. The rubbish goes into gardens. The poor people that live opposite have to see this every time they leave their house. This is what it's like at least three times a week. It needs open bins and a cage.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ballance Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
